```{r}
library(readxl)
Improved_Data <- read_excel("C:/Users/Admin/Downloads/Improved_Data.xlsx")
View(Improved_Data)
library(tseries)
attach(Improved_Data)
#Declaring the datset to be time series
GDPseries<-ts(GDP,start = c(2007),frequency = 1)
MVAseries<-ts(MVA,start = c(2007),frequency = 1)
Inflaseries<-ts(INF,start = c(2007),frequency = 1)
FDIseries<-ts(FDI,start = c(2007),frequency = 1)
EDUseries<-ts(EDU,start = c(2007),frequency = 1)
DEVseries<-ts(DEV_EXP,start = c(2007),frequency = 1)
NETseries<-ts(NET_EX,start = c(2007),frequency = 1)
#Testing for unit root
library(urca)
adf.test(GDPseries)
adf.test(MVAseries)
adf.test(Inflaseries)
adf.test(FDIseries)
adf.test(EDUseries)
adf.test(DEVseries)
adf.test(NETseries)
plot(GDPseries)
plot(MVAseries)
acf(GDPseries)
pacf(GDPseries)
Newdata<-cbind(GDPseries,MVAseries,Inflaseries,FDIseries,DEVseries,NETseries)
library(vars)
lagselect<-VARselect(Newdata,lag.max = 5,type = c('none'))
lagselect$selection
```
